a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Smallpox death rate versus life expectancy in Sweden

The
period life expectancy at birth
versus the smallpox death rate per 10,000 people in Sweden.
Note: Shown is the period life expectancy. This is the average number of years a newborn would live if age-specific mortality rates in
the current year were to stay the same throughout its life.
